summary: Simple mod that makes vanilla Mjoll much stronger for endgame
descriptionHtml: This mods makes Mjoll The Lioness stronger by adding all heavy armor, twohanded and one handed perks, also changes her animations to female and gives her the overdraw perk and shield wall perk. Mjoll can now use animal allegiance shout and level up with the player infinitely.
author: Chendu2

files.name: Better Vanilla Mjoll
files.changelogHtml:
Adds, heavy armor, 2h, 1h, archery, and block perks.
Adds animal allegiance shout.
Level up with player infinitely.
